name: ShelfLife
tag_list: social-commerce, ecommerce, encyclopedia, social-network, sell, buy, collect, collectibles
overview:
ShelfLife is the social commerce platform that provides 30 million North American collectors with everything they need in one place.

Think of it as the best parts of Wikipedia, Ebay + Social for collectors with a bunch of smart advances. What Etsy did for DIY goods, we intend to do for the $110B US collectibles market.

ShelfLife is the ultimate platform for collectors because it’s loaded with everything they need to research, acquire and socialize around their collections. We make buying and selling collectibles more social, efficient and profitable for collectors and the vendors that sell to them.

Our permanent record of every collectible ever made allows collectors to track their collections and be automatically matched with buyers and sellers.

Our mobile strategy bridges the gap between online and offline commerce, and our advanced social tools gamify the process of collecting by leveraging competitive mechanics to encourage accelerated buying behavior.

offices.address1: MaRS Discovery District 101 College St., Toronto ON
